name: A Soup of Untangled Roots
description:
Culture, language, and traditions are things that can be lost to time and difficult to recover, especially when growing up in a different environment than one's parents and grandparents. The goal is to make your grandma her favorite soup; sounds simple enough, right? Except the recipe is in ancient rabbit language, which is a language that was never passed down to you. Embark on a quest to decipher the mysterious recipe by interacting with other old folks from the neighborhood and untangling your own cultural roots.

Cheat Sheet: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1bxwFQdtwyJ3-fP62JcTftcKAp4vKJ2U9/view?usp=shari...
